column7: Course is the second of two 3-hour science methods courses in the elementary education program. Focus on in-depth understanding of inquiry science teaching. Coursework is integrated with field assignments in schools. Topics include curriculum materials; literacy instruction in science; children's "thinking" about science; differentiated instruction; assessment; incorporating technology. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CI 450; admission to the Elementary Teacher Education Program.
column9: 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CI 450; admission to the Elementary Teacher Education Program.
